data.text: @Lenchen0813 Hello Lenchen, we apologize for the late resolution of your refund. We thank you for the information provided and inform you that your refund is being processed. It will be completed as soon as possible. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.

@George_InsureMe @TAP_Portugal Hello George, thank you for the feedback. We apologize for the late resolution of your file. We have reinforced your file and assure you that the situation will be completed as soon as possible. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.

@RTostoes Olá Rui,
Informamos que neste caso as milhas podem ter sido utilizados para usufruir do desconto Miles&Go e sempre que o cliente não disponha da totalidade das milhas necessárias para a aplicação do desconto, o cliente irá ficar com um saldo negativo. (1/2)

@l_khami Olá,
Pedimos que nos indique o seu código de reserva e/ou número do bilhete eletrónico, para que possamos verificar a sua situação.
De forma a garantir a confidencialidade dos seus dados sugerimos que o faça por mensagem privada.
Obrigada.

@OGBluFoxMobile Hello Omer,
In order to assist you, please provide us the booking reference and/or the ticket number.  
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.

@eatsmarques Olá eatsmarques, 
Respondemos à sua mensagem privada.  
Permanecemos ao dispor. 
Obrigado.

@George_InsureMe @TAP_Portugal Hello George, 
To verify the situation, please confirm us the claim reference number and the e-mail address associated to it.
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.  
Thank you.
@stonktrading We reiterate the information previously provided. Thank you.
@stonktrading Invoices are issued in a digital format and are sent by email. You can then print it if you wish to do so. Thank you.
@stonktrading If you intend to receive a receipt, please DM us your booking information and we will forward it to your email. Thank you.
@stonktrading You were charged because your bag did not comply with the established rules. Thank you.
@stonktrading Depending on the origin and destination, the rates applied vary. The values are nevertheless tabulated. Thank you.
@stonktrading The website states from 70€. For your flight 80€ applied. No refund is due. Thank you.

@Zaa_Vader If you have already submitted a complaint, you will need to await feedback via email. Regarding the refund of your current flight, you can request it directly on our website, keeping in mind that it will be processed according to the fare rules of the ticket. Thank you.

@stonktrading Although we understand your considerations, this information is available and displayed on our website using the following link - https://t.co/dEYBJEgo53. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.

urls.title: Hand baggage allowed on the aircraft
urls.description: Find out all about hand baggage on board TAP aircraft: what weight and sizes are allowed and what you can carry in the cabin.

data.text: @Latiatia44 Bonjour! Afin de vérifier la situation, veuillez nous envoyer un message direct avec le numéro de dossier ou de billet électronique, ainsi que la date de vol correcte. Merci d'avance.
@Zaa_Vader Thank you.

@Zaa_Vader Concerning the delayed bag of your last trip, we recommend that you submit, for compensation and refund of expenses purposes, the following form available on our website - https://t.co/bwFSKNusL7. We also recommend that you carry medication in hand luggage whenever possible.

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text: @Zaa_Vader We are truly sorry for all the distress caused but all clarifications have already been provided through this channel regarding your current booking.
@golgoli131 Hello, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@sduncalf Hello Sharon, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@jgmorim Olá! Agradecemos a sua partilha! 😉
@goenning Hello Guilherme, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.

@Priscil80361352 Hello Priscila, please send us your query, along with your TAP Miles&Go number and the e-mail address associated, by direct message to ensure the confidentiality of your data, as requested before. We thank you in advance for the information.
@AldasGri Hello Aldas, please send us your booking reference and/or ticket number to verify, by direct message, for confidentiality reasons. We thank you in advance for the information.
@Zaa_Vader Although we understand your considerations, a full refund is not eligible in such cases. Thank you.

@Zaa_Vader Hi! We inform that refunds (in form of a voucher or to the original payment method) are always processed in accordance with the fare rules purchased, except in the case of irregularities (flight cancellations). Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you

@CojoneroTapon @amparo50698714 Hola! Lamentamos la situación reportada. Le informamos que su reclamación sigue en análisis. Se le contactará por correo electrónico lo antes posible, por lo que le pedimos que espere por favor. Quedamos a su entera disposición para cualquier duda o aclaración adicional. Gracias.

@PaulHarvie9 Hi! We inform you that your complaint is still under review. You will be contacted by email very soon. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.
@q_meiji Hello, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@pigie10h Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.

@pigie10h Hi! We inform you that we cannot precise a time frame for the review and completion of your complaint. If you have already submitted a complaint, you will need to await feedback via email. We appreciate your patience at this time.
@KampferSeverin Hello Severin, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@luana00372289 @DMbuttstuff We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.

@luana00372289 @DMbuttstuff Hi! Although we understand your urgency and dissatisfaction with the time taken in handling your complaint, all we can assure you is that your case has not been forgotten and is still under review. You will be contacted by email as soon as possible.
@ReshmaVithlani We are verifying the situation, Reshma. We kindly ask you to wait for our feedback. Thank you.

@NicolasChapuis3 Hello Nicolas, we apologize for the late reply. We are verifying this situation. We kindly ask you to wait for our feedback, which will be made as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding.

@mismartinz Hello Olaide, we apologize for the late reply. We are verifying the situation. We kindly ask you to wait for our feedback, which will be made as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding.
@greatauntpearl Hi! We have in the meantime replied to your DM. In regard to the app registration, please send us a direct message with the error encountered. Thank you.
@carolc1965 For confidentiality reasons, we suggest sending the data by private message. Thank you in advance. 2/2

@carolc1965 Hello Carol, we are truly sorry for the situation and inconvenience experienced. In order to verify, please confirm us your lost luggage file number (PIR), as well as your ticket number, bookings reference and email address. 1/2
@AugustineBoisv1 Hello Augustine, we are verifying the situation and will get back to you. Thank you.

@banzib Hello Bryan,
Please inform us about your query and provide us with your booking reference and/or electronic ticket number, so we may verify if we are able to help you through this channel.
For confidentiality reasons we suggest that you do so per private message.
Thank you.
@PatriciaToht For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you send it by private message. Thank you in advance.  2/2

@PatriciaToht Hello Patricia, we apologise for the late answer. The high number of incoming contacts has not allowed us to answer more quickly. In order to verify the information, can you please inform us your bookings reference, the ticket number and your email address? 1/2
@souzarafaela Disponha sempre Rafaela. ✈️

@luana00372289 @DMbuttstuff Thank you, luana.
We verify that your case is under analysis and that you will be contacted by e-mail as soon as possible.
Meanwhile, if you need any further assistance, please let us know.
Thank you.
@q_meiji Thank you, Meiji_q. We will wait for the details 😊

@hugocarvalho09 Olá Hugo,
desde já, lamentamos a situação que reporta, no entanto, por vezes, situações pontuais podem originar atrasos inesperados. 
Qualquer questão/situação em que possamos ajudar através deste canal, por favor indique-nos.
Obrigada.

@MitchellEaster8 Hello Mitchell,
our apologies for the waiting.
We will reply to your private message as soon as possible.
We thank you for your understanding.
@MiguelNBA77 Uma vez mais, agradecemos a sua compreensão e estamos ao seu dispor para qualquer esclarecimento adicional. (2/2)

@souzarafaela Olá Rafaela, 
Informamos que já respondemos à sua mensagem privada.  
Permanecemos ao dispor. 
Obrigado.
@RebecaBinda Obrigada, Rebeca. Vamos verificar a responderemos com a maior brevidade possível.
@EatueCSGO Sus DM han sido contestados. Gracias.
@EatueCSGO Hola Eatue, ¿cómo podemos ayudar por acá? Envíenos su consulta por mensaje/DM. Estamos disponibles.
@luana00372289 @DMbuttstuff For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. Thank you. (2/2)

@luana00372289 @DMbuttstuff Hello luana,
if you have a refund request not finalized with us, in order to verify the situation, please provide us with the booking reference/ticket number and e-mail address associated. (1/2)

@EduardoBurigoS Olá Eduardo, 
desde já, lamentamos o tempo de espera. Respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada.

@EduardoBurigoS Olá Eduardo,
desde já, lamentamos o tempo de espera.
Respondemos à sua mensagem privada.
Obrigada.

@JajaTaylor2022 Hello Joycelyn,
first of all, please accept our apologies for any disappointment caused. 
We have replied to your private message.
Thank you.

@EstelleKershaw Thank you, Estelle.
We will verify and reply as soon as possible.

@lauramego Hola lauramg,
para verificar el estado de su solicitud, por favor indíquenos el número de su caso y la dirección de correo electrónico asociada. 
Para salvaguardar la confidencialidad de sus datos, le sugerimos que los envíe por mensaje privado.
Gracias.

@Z_ashford Hello Zac,
our apologies for the waiting.
We have replied to your private message.
Thank you.
@RebecaBinda Olá Rebeca, respondemos por mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@Klaas44867842 Hello Klaas, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@ReshmaVithlani Hello Reshma, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@laura_barry Hello Laura, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@carrasco_77 Hola! Lamentamos la situación reportada. Le informamos de que su reclamación sigue en análisis. Se le contactará por correo electrónico lo antes posible, por lo que le pedimos que espere por favor. Gracias.
@sakoun Hello sakoun, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.
@SeckNdanane4_1 Bonjour Seck, une réponse vous a été apportée en message. Merci.
@Numensito Hola Numen, su DM ha sido contestado. Gracias.

@pacosepulcre Hola paco, lamentamos la situación. De todos modos, y como hemos indicado hace unos días, su reclamo sigue bajo análisis y tiene que aguardar para que sea contactado directamente luego que sea finalizado. Si acaso tiene alguna otra cuestión, disponga.

@Marcela16012 Olá Marcela,
Respondemos por DM.
@araujovmarcos Olá Marcos, respondemos por mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@michellewelch05 Hello Michelle, we are verifying the situation. We kindly ask you to wait for our feedback, which will be made as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding.
